Class ChangeEvent

java.lang.Object
  com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.data.ChangeEvent
Direct Known Subclasses:
PropertyChangeEvent
public class ChangeEvent
extends java.lang.Object

Instances of this class are sent as a result of model changes.

See Also:
